dct_description_sm: Atlas based on author's pilgrimage to the Holy Land during 1483-1484.
Title and imprint supplied by cataloger; author name from frontispiece; edition statement from pencil inscription on page [3].
Title translation: Pilgrimage to the Holy Land.
First 4 and last 4 pages blank (included in page description).
Color in last two leaves of plates and fifth foldout map.
Map of Jerusalem includes points of interest for Christian pilgrims, including Mount Sinai, Temple of Soloman (i.e., Mosque of Omar) and Church of Holy Sepulchre.
dct_rights_sm: Images from the The Renaissance Exploration Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
